td.div: The Wilkinson County School District does not discriminate in any programs, activities, or hiring on the basis of sex, race, creed, religion, color, national origin, age, veteran or military status, sexual orientation, gender expression or identity, or disability. For questions and complaints of alleged discrimination, please contact Chavis L. Bradford, Superintendent, at 601-888-3582.
